name: Pathsweeper
description:
A puzzle game based on Minesweeper where you have to connect both sides, by avoiding fake spots.

If you played Minesweep before, you should remember that there were many safe spots and few mines for you to find. Imagine now you have a lot of fake spots (mines) and only one stream passing through it.

This is my entry for  Extra Credits Game Jam #4.

[Instructions]

  • You must find the only path that connects both sides.
  • The numbers within blue spot are the amount of fake spots around them (all 8 spots around each blue spot, when applies).
  • Diagonals are not considered as a connection, however they may count as fake spot.
